entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 13 February 2023
